metadata.title: CVE-2021-21185 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in extensions in Google Chrome prior to89.0.4389.72 allowed an attacker who convinced a user to install amalicious extension to obtain sensitive information via a crafted ChromeExtension.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
